tika-s0519t1:1_0: Yanti aniyamattho sabbanāmasaddo kammasādhanavasena vutto. Atthāvabodhanattho saddappayogo
tika-s0519t1:1_1: atthaparādhīno kevalo atthapadatthako , so padatthavipariyesakārinā iti-saddena parabhūtena
tika-s0519t1:1_2: saddapadatthako jāyatīti āha ‘‘yanti aniyamato upayoganiddeso’’ti. Lokoti kattuniddesotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0519t1:2_1: vatvā idāni avayavajotanavasena padatthaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘lokiyanti etthā’’tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t1:2_2: Lokasaddo idha sāmatthiyato sattalokavacano daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha ‘‘pūjanakiriyāyogyabhūtatāvasenā’’ti.
tika-s0519t1:2_3: Sāsanantaradhānato paraṁ pūjanā aññabuddhuppādena veditabbā, yathetarahi vipassīādisammāsambuddhānaṁ.
tika-s0519t1:2_5: sumedhapaṇḍitattabhāvena pana pavattiṁ sandhāya vuttanti āha ‘‘yathāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto’’ti.
tika-s0519t1:3_1: Tena vuttaṁ ‘‘suññatamukhādīhī’’ti. Tathā ca vuttanti viññūhi vedanīyatāya eva sāsanavarassa vuttaṁ bhagavatā –
tika-s0519t1:4_0: ‘‘Etu viññū puriso asaṭho amāyāvī ujujātiko, ahamanusāsāmi, ahaṁ dhammaṁ desemi,
tika-s0519t1:4_1: yathānusiṭṭhaṁ tathā paṭipajjamāno na cirasseva sāmaññeva ussati, sāmaṁ dakkhitī’’tiādi (ma. ni. 2.281).
tika-s0519t1:5_0: Yaṁ-saddo sāsanavisayo, lokapālasaddo satthuvisayopi lokaṁ pati guṇībhūtoti ‘‘tassā’’ti
tika-s0519t1:5_1: paṭiniddesassa kathaṁ satthuvisayatāti codanaṁ manasikatvā āha ‘‘salokapāloti cetthā’’tiādi,
tika-s0519t1:5_2: guṇībhūtopi lokapālasaddo padhānabhūto viya paṭiniddesaṁ arahati. Añño hi saddakkamo, añño atthakkamoti.
tika-s0519t1:6_0: Dhammagāravena bhagavā dhammaṁ pūjento veneyyabandhave acintetvā samāpattisamāpajjanadhammapaccavekkhaṇāhi
tika-s0519t1:6_1: sattasattāhaṁ vītināmesīti āha ‘‘bhagavato…pe… dīpetabbā’’ti. Tattha ādisaddena sāvakehi
tika-s0519t1:7_0: Iccassāti iti assa, evaṁ bhagavato aviparītaanantarāyikaniyyānikadhammadesanāya sabbaññutānāvaraṇabhāvadīpanenāti
tika-s0519t1:7_1: attho. Tenāti catuvesārajjayogena. Tadavinābhāvinā dasabala…pe… pakāsitā hoti. Āveṇikabuddhadhammādīti
tika-s0519t1:7_2: ettha ādisaddena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇāni, catusaccañāṇāni, catupaṭisambhidāñāṇāni,
tika-s0519t1:7_3: pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇāni, cha abhiññāñāṇāni, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0519t1:7_4: aṭṭha vijjā, aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampanañāṇāni, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava samādhicariyā,
tika-s0519t1:7_5: nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakaraṇā dhammā, dasa ariyavāsā, dvādasa dhammacakkākārā,
tika-s0519t1:7_6: terasa dhutadhammā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pannarasa caraṇadhammā, soḷasa ñāṇacariyā,
tika-s0519t1:7_7: soḷasa ānāpānassatī, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, catuvīsati paccayavibhāvanañāṇāni,
tika-s0519t1:8_0: Aparo nayo – guṇavisiṭṭhataṁ dīpeti, sā ca guṇavisiṭṭhatā mahākaruṇāmahāpaññāhi veditabbā
tika-s0519t1:8_1: tāhi satthusampattisiddhito. Tattha mahākaruṇāya pavattibhedo ‘‘bahukehi ākārehi
tika-s0519t1:8_2: passantānaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ sattesu mahākaruṇā okkamatī’’tiādinā paṭisambhidāmagge
tika-s0519t1:8_3: (paṭi. ma. 1.117) vuttanayena veditabbo. Mahāpaññāya pana pavattibhedo vutto eva.
tika-s0519t1:8_4: Tattha karuṇāya bhagavato caraṇasampatti, paññāya vijjāsampatti. Karuṇāya sattādhipatitā,
tika-s0519t1:8_5: paññāya dhammādhipatitā. Karuṇāya lokanāthatā, paññāya attanāthatā. Karuṇāya pubbakāritā,
tika-s0519t1:8_6: paññāya kataññutā. Karuṇāya aparantapatā, paññāya anattantapatā. Karuṇāya buddhakaradhammasiddhi,
tika-s0519t1:8_7: paññāya buddhabhāvasiddhi. Karuṇāya paresaṁ tāraṇaṁ, paññāya sayaṁ tāraṇaṁ. Karuṇāya
tika-s0519t1:8_8: sabbasattesu anuggahacittatā, paññāya sabbadhammesu virattacittatā pakāsitā hotīti
tika-s0519t1:8_9: anavasesato parahitapaṭipattiyā, attahitasampattiyā ca pāripūrī veditabbā. Tīsupi
tika-s0519t1:9_0: Abhisamayo paṭivedhasāsanassa, manasikaraṇaṁ paṭipattisāsanassa, savanādīhi paricayakaraṇaṁ
tika-s0519t1:9_2: dhammadesanenā’’ti iminā idha ‘‘sāsana’’nti vuttassa tividhassāpi saddhammassa avisesena
tika-s0519t1:9_3: desanāpūjaṁ vatvā thomanāpūjanassa vasena taṁ vibhajitvā dassento ‘‘ariyaṁ, vo bhikkhave’’tiādimāha.
tika-s0519t1:9_5: vā vasena idhāpi padayojanā veditabbā. Ariyabhāvādayoti ariyaseṭṭhaaggabhāvādayo.
tika-s0519t1:10: Idāni ariyasaṅghaguṇānampi imāya gāthāya pakāsitabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yasmā panā’’tiādi vuttaṁ. Bālyādisamatikkamanatoti bālaabyattabhāvādisamatikkamanato.
tika-s0519t1:11_1: avatthābhedo. Ubhayanti byañjanapadaṁ, atthapadañca. Ubhayathāti karaṇakammasādhanavasena
tika-s0519t1:12_0: ‘‘Ayañca gāthā’’tiādi kesañci vādo. Tathā hi apare ‘‘therenevāyaṁ gāthā bhāsitā’’ti
tika-s0519t1:12_1: vadanti. Attūpanāyikāpi hi kadāci dhammadesanā hoti eva yathā ‘‘dasabalasamannāgato
tika-s0519t1:12_2: , bhikkhave, tathāgato catuvesārajjavisārado’’tiādi (saṁ. ni. 2.21-22). Evañca katvā
tika-s0519t1:13: Yathāvuttaatthamukhenevāti mūlapadasaṅkhātaatthuddhāreneva. Parato āgamissatīti niddesavārassa pariyosāne āgamissati ‘‘tīṇi ca nayā anūnā’’tiādinā (netti. 4 dvādasapada).
tika-s0519t1:14_0: Vuccatīti kattari kammaniddesoti āha ‘‘vadatī’’ti. Atha vā vuccatīti kammakattuniddesoyaṁ.
tika-s0519t1:14_1: Ayañhettha attho – hārā, nayā cāti ubhayaṁ pariggahitaṁ saṁvaṇṇakena sabbathā gahitañce,
tika-s0519t1:14_2: vuccati suttaṁ, sayameva suttaṁ saṁvaṇṇetīti , etena hāranayesu vasībhāvena suttasaṁvaṇṇanāya sukarataṁ dasseti.
tika-s0519t1:15_0: Pakārantarenāti pubbe ‘‘sāsana’’nti vuttamatthaṁ ‘‘desanā, desita’’nti tato aññena
tika-s0519t1:15_1: pakārena. Niyametvāti tassa ekantato viññeyyataṁ avadhāretvā. Viññeyyatā visiṭṭhesu
tika-s0519t1:16: Desanādesitāni ca yāvadeva vijānanatthānīti vijānanaṁ padhānanti tameva niddhārento ‘‘tatrāti tasmiṁ vijānane’’ti āha.
tika-s0519t1:17_0: Etthāhāti navaṅgasāsananavavidhasuttantāti etasmiṁ atthavacane āha codako. Tassāyaṁ
tika-s0519t1:17_1: adhippāyo – navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi bhavitabbaṁ, tathā
tika-s0519t1:17_2: ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīnīti navavidhasuttantavacanaṁ virujjheyya. Atha
tika-s0519t1:17_3: suttasabhāvāni geyyaṅgādīni, evaṁ sati ‘‘sutta’’nti visuṁ suttaṅgaṁ na siyā, evaṁ
tika-s0519t1:17_4: sante aṭṭhaṅgasāsanaṁ āpajjatīti. Tenāha ‘‘kathaṁ panā’’tiādi. Geyyaṅgādīsu katipayānampi
tika-s0519t1:17_5: suttabhāve yathāvuttadosānativatti, pageva sabbesanti dasseti ‘‘yañcā’’tiādinā. Saṅgahesūti
tika-s0519t1:17_6: aṭṭhakathāsu. Porāṇaṭṭhakathānañhi saṅkhepabhūtā idāni aṭṭhakathā ‘‘saṅgahā’’ti vuttā.
tika-s0519t1:17_7: Suttaṁ nāma sagāthakaṁ vā siyā, niggāthakaṁ vāti aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṅgaṁ katanti
tika-s0519t1:17_8: visuṁ suttaṅgassa asambhavo tadubhayavinimuttassa suttassa abhāvato. Tena vuttaṁ
tika-s0519t1:17_9: ‘‘suttaṅgameva na siyā’’ti. Athāpi kathañci. Siyāti vakkhamānaṁ sāmaññavidhiṁ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0519t1:18_2: gahetvā ‘‘evaṁ sante’’tiādinā codeti. Itaro pana okāsavidhito anokāso vidhi balavāti
tika-s0519t1:18_3: ñāyaṁ gāthāvirahitaṁyeva veyyākaraṇanti, idhādhippetanti ca dassento ‘‘nāpajjatī’’tiādinā
tika-s0519t1:18_4: pariharati. Tathā hīti teneva kāraṇena, satipi saññantaranimittayoge anokāsasaññānaṁ
